item.title: Do Eye Floaters Ever Stop Driving You Crazy?
item.description:
If you’re asking this, you’re probably at your limit.

“Do eye floaters ever stop driving you crazy?”

You’ve noticed them. Obsessed over them. Tried to forget them.
And now, you’re just… tired.

Tired of fighting your own eyes.
Tired of explaining it to people who don’t get it.
Tired of wondering if you’ll ever feel normal again.

Let’s talk about that — honestly.

First: You’re Not Crazy

You’re stuck in a loop.
A visual trap that your brain hasn’t learned how to ignore yet.
